name: Moon Design System (Public Beta)
description:
Moon is Yolo Group product design system that helps us maintain the integrity of their user experience and optimise design and development resources.


Update:

  • Added new components: Bottom sheet; Drawer; Blindspot; Bottom navigation; Charts; Floating toolbar; Progress; Snackbar; Switch button; Table; Text input group; Auth code; Text area.
  • Separated Typorgaphy, Grid, Shadow styles to Library
  • Added UX patterns list


More details on Moon.io
